siteInfo.title: Corporate Synergy Development Center
siteInfo.subtitle: Corporate Synergy Development Center
siteInfo.description: Building CSD System, Assisting Industry Upgrading

history.title: CSD Development History
history.subtitle: A Storyteller's Tale
history.description: This is not an ordinary institutional story, but a legend that witnessed Taiwan's economic miracle, accompanied industrial transformation, and promoted social progress.

timeline.title: Birth of CSD Group
timeline.description: The Industrial Development Bureau of the Ministry of Economic Affairs established the 'Center-Satellite Factory System Promotion Group', abbreviated as 'CSD Group'. The core concept is 'coexistence and co-prosperity', allowing large factories and satellite factories to establish complementary and mutually beneficial cooperative relationships.
timeline.background: In the 1980s, Taiwan was in the transition from industrial economy to high-tech industry, and it was an era of economic takeoff.

timeline.title: CSD Center's Glorious Transformation
timeline.description: Reorganized into 'Corporate Synergy Development Center', with the English name 'Corporate Synergy Development Center', abbreviated as CSD. From a government agency subsidiary to an independent legal entity foundation.
timeline.background: To make the organization more flexible and able to serve more targets, they reorganized into a foundation.

timeline.title: Promotion of Asia-Pacific Operations Center Plan
timeline.description: The Executive Yuan officially approved the 'Asia-Pacific Operations Center Plan' to make Taiwan an operations center in the Asia-Pacific region. CSD Center is an important implementation platform of the Ministry of Economic Affairs, responsible for transforming government policies into actual industrial actions.
timeline.background: Covering six major areas: transportation, finance, telecommunications, media, trade and corporate operations centers.

timeline.title: WTO Accession and Global Competition
timeline.description: Taiwan officially joined the WTO, marking Taiwan's complete integration into the global system. CSD Center assists enterprises in enhancing international competitiveness and building global supply chain networks.
timeline.background: Global competition is becoming increasingly fierce, and Taiwanese enterprises need stronger international competitiveness.

timeline.title: Establishment of Aerospace A Team
timeline.description: CSD Center assisted in establishing the Aerospace A Team, with the center factory being AIDC and 247 member factories, promoting the introduction of smart manufacturing cooperation projects, setting smart machine standards, and expanding AS 9100 participation in aerospace industry domestic aircraft manufacturing.
timeline.background: In 2011, Germany revealed the Industry 4.0 concept, and international market competition intensified.

timeline.title: Smart Low-Carbon Dual-Axis Transformation
timeline.description: CSD Center began promoting smart low-carbon dual-axis transformation, assisting the Gudeng system in smart carbon reduction, expanding from 10 to 38 companies with large companies leading small ones, moving towards 10,000 tons of carbon reduction.
timeline.background: Entering the 2020s, sustainable development has become a global consensus.

achievements.title: CSD Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Strength Demonstrated by Data
achievements.description: These are not cold statistical numbers, but every number behind represents the growth of countless enterprises, the livelihood of countless families, and the transformation of countless industries.

forwardService.title: Forward Service Department
forwardService.subtitle: Innovative Force Leading the Future
forwardService.description: The Forward Service Department is not a traditional business department, but a cross-domain integrated innovation platform. We stand at the crossroads of the times, using forward-looking vision, innovative thinking, and professional capabilities to create new paths for Taiwan's future development.

vision.title: Core Vision
vision.description: We want to become the leader of Taiwan's industrial transformation, the promoter of social development, and the creator of future trends.

positioning.title: Department Positioning
positioning.description: We always adhere to the 'customer-centric' service philosophy, using innovative thinking and professional capabilities to create maximum value for customers.

successCases.title: International Transformation of Qingmutang Cooperative
successCases.description: Introduced IoT technology, activated over 20 hectares of abandoned land in Shuishang Township, signed trade cooperation memorandums with Japanese company Maohua Co., Ltd. and Fuhe Fresh, with expected overseas revenue CAGR of 10% for 3 consecutive years.

successCases.title: Smart Agriculture Transformation of Xianlv Agricultural Technology
successCases.description: Established standardized field cultivation management, introduced IoT technology for field monitoring, contracted nearly 700 hectares of corn farmland, successfully negotiated cooperation with foreign large trading groups.

successCases.title: LiMA Indigenous Product Channel Brand Establishment
successCases.description: 162 listed operators, about 2000 product items, established a complete virtual-real integrated channel network, successfully expanded international markets.

contact.title: Contact Inquiry
contact.subtitle: Create the Future with Us
contact.description: If you are interested in our services or would like to learn more information, please feel free to contact us. We will sincerely provide you with professional consulting services.
